title: Equipment and Crafting
content:
Equipment & Magic for Baldur's Gate 3 covers categories that involve the various arsenal that is used in and out of battle in the game. These may vary from Armor, unlockable Costumes, various Weapons, Spells, Materia, and Items. Players can find guides on how to obtain the various equipment and learn about each of its statistical values by checking each category link below.
